decks.notes: The main concept of the deck is to quickly assemble the components needed to cast Coveted Jewel and generate a large amount of mana, potentially allowing for a game-winning combo with Emrakul, the Aeons Torn or The One Ring. The deck incorporates cards like Transmute Artifact, Grim Monolith, and Copy Artifact to ramp up mana production and protect the combo with cards like Force of Will. Show and Tell can also be used to cheat out key pieces like Emrakul, while stocking up on resources with Stock Up and setting up the combo with Preordain and Lat-Nam's Legacy.

This Death & Taxes deck focuses on disrupting opponents with cards like Thoughtseize and Skyclave Apparition, while using Aether Vial to quickly deploy creatures like Stoneforge Mystic and Recruiter of the Guard. The deck also utilizes powerful cards like Solitude and Swords to Plowshares for removal, as well as Karakas for protection. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in the deck. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure and control the board to secure victory.

This Dimir Tempo deck focuses on controlling the game by disrupting opponents with Thoughtseize and Force of Will, while also utilizing efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Snuff Out. The deck aims to apply pressure through efficient threats like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, while maintaining card advantage with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brainstorm. Wasteland is used to disrupt opponents' mana bases, while Daze provides extra tempo advantage. Overall, this deck aims to control the game and finish off opponents quickly with a mix of disruption and aggression.

This deck aims to aggressively control the tempo of the game by using disruptive spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize while deploying quickly growing threats like Tarmogoyf and Murktide Regent. It also utilizes powerful creatures like Brazen Borrower and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares to maintain pressure on the opponent. With a mix of disruption, card advantage, and efficient threats, this deck looks to quickly establish dominance on the battlefield and close out the game before the opponent can fully stabilize.

This Dragon Stompy deck focuses on quick aggressive plays by utilizing efficient mana acceleration, disruptive creatures like Magus of the Moon, and powerful removal spells like Fury and Sundering Eruption. The deck also aims to lock opponents out of playing spells with cards like Chalice of the Void and Blood Moon while leveraging the powerful land Urza's Saga for additional value. The primary goal is to overwhelm opponents with threats quickly and disrupt their game plan, ultimately leading to victory through overwhelming pressure and disruption.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Magus of the Moon and Trinisphere, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Chancellor of the Annex and Seasoned Dungeoneer. The deck aims to lock the opponent out of the game while advancing its own game plan through efficient mana acceleration and powerful creatures. The combination of disruptive elements and aggressive threats makes this deck a formidable force in the Legacy format, punishing opponents for playing non-basic lands and inefficient spells.

The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Amped Raptor and Guide of Souls, backed up by disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Wasteland and use synergies like Goblin Bombardment to finish off the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes some sacrifice outlets like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ocelot Pride to gain additional value from sacrificing creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Shallow Grave. The deck also includes cards like Show and Tell and Collective Brutality to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect your reanimated creatures. The aim is to establish a dominant board presence early in the game and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats. It combines elements of combo and reanimator strategies to create a fast and aggressive gameplay style.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through mana denial using cards like Wasteland and Boseiju, Who Endures, while utilizing the land toolbox strategy with Thespian's Stage, Dark Depths, and Crop Rotation. The main win condition is to assemble the Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage combo to create a 20/20 Marit Lage token. The deck also includes disruption and graveyard hate cards like Disruptor Flute and Bojuka Bog to deal with opposing threats and strategies. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while efficiently building towards the Marit Lage win condition.

The key concept of this deck is to apply early pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Barrowgoyf and Nethergoyf while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The deck aims to control the tempo of the game through efficient removal spells and disruption, while also utilizing cards like Reanimate and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to generate card advantage and maintain board presence. The inclusion of Norman Osborn and Abhorrent Oculus provide additional threats and ways to close out the game quickly, making it a versatile and powerful aggro deck in the Legacy format.

The main concept of the deck is to utilize the powerful Eldrazi creatures along with mana acceleration to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. The deck features a mix of Eldrazi creatures such as Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer, supported by cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game and maintain tempo advantage with its disruptive elements, ultimately leading to victory through aggressive Eldrazi attacks.

The main focus of this deck is to control the tempo of the game by using disruptive spells like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, Daze, and Fatal Push, while also applying pressure with efficient creatures like Murktide Regent, Brazen Borrower, and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan through hand disruption and removal spells, while also presenting a clock with evasive threats. The mana base is optimized for consistency and allows for flexible casting of spells. The goal is to maintain a strong board presence while keeping the opponent on the back foot.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan through control elements such as counterspells, removal, and hand disruption. The deck also aims to generate card advantage through cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. It utilizes a mix of creatures with relevant abilities and spells to control the board and outvalue the opponent. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers and versatile spells like Brainstorm and Ponder allows the player to adapt to different situations and maintain control of the game.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with low-cost, efficient creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent, while disrupting the opponent with countermagic and removal like Force of Will and Lightning Bolt. The deck also utilizes cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm to dig for key cards and maintain consistency. Wasteland is included to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while cards like Daze provide additional tempo advantage. The deck aims to close out the game quickly by applying pressure and preventing the opponent from establishing a board presence.

The main idea behind this deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with powerful creatures, such as Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty, and then use spells like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Shallow Grave to bring them back onto the battlefield for a massive advantage. With cards like Unmask and Cabal Therapy to disrupt your opponent's plans and efficient mana acceleration from Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual, you can quickly overwhelm your opponent with powerful reanimated creatures in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on using powerful Eldrazi creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent and disrupt their game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void. The synergy between Eldrazi Temple, Eye of Ugin, and Unclaimed Territory allows for early and consistent casting of threatening creatures. Cards like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer provide both aggression and disruption, making it difficult for the opponent to stabilize. With a mix of mana acceleration, disruptive elements, and efficient threats, this deck aims to apply pressure and close out games before the opponent can establish their own strategy.
